title: Prayagraj/Allahabad Kumbh Mela: Everything you should know about the world's biggest religious festival
content: Kumbh Mela or Kumbha Mela is a mass Hindu pilgrimage of faith in which Hindus gather to bathe in a sacred or holy river.
